sentences.en: The dorm will remain open until 5 pm.
sentences.cn: 宿舍将一直开放到下午5点。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I left my Student ID card in the dorm.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我把学生证落在宿舍了。

sentences.en: You've had bull sessions with your high school friends or in your college dorm.
sentences.cn: 你们和你们的高中朋友们或在大学宿舍有过自由讨论。
